#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<utility>
#include<cassert>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              int f1=0,f2=1,f3=0,cnt=2;
              while(f3<n)
              {
                        cnt++;
                        f3=f1+f2;
                        f1=f2;
                        f2=f3;
              }
              cnt--;
              //cout<<cnt<<endl;
              n%=cnt;
              n%=8;
              printf("%d\n",n);
    }
    return 0;
}
